meanings.sent1: The oilproof gloves kept my hands clean while I fixed the car.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic wore oilproof overalls to protect his clothes from grease stains.
meanings.sent3: The oilproof apron made the chef look like a superhero in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as oilproof as a raincoat in a storm.
meanings.sent5: The oilproof coating on the pan ensured easy cleanup after cooking.

meanings.definition: Able to withstand contact with oil without being damaged.
meanings.sent1: The oilproof seal on the container prevented leaks during transportation.
meanings.sent2: The oilproof phone case protected the device from spills and splashes.
meanings.sent3: The oilproof backpack saved the student's homework from a disastrous oil spill.
meanings.sent4: His resolve was as oilproof as a shield in battle.
meanings.sent5: The oilproof material of the jacket kept the rain out on a stormy day.
